ЁЯЫбя╕П
Savior of India

He repelled the fierce invasion of the barbarian Hunas. Due to this success, he is called the 'Savior of India'.

ЁЯМК
Renovation of Sudarshan Lake

According to the Junagadh inscription, Chakrapalit, the son of his governor Parс╣Зadatta, repaired the dam of Sudarshan Lake in Girnar.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Titles: Kramaditya, Vikramaditya (second time).
  • Bhitari Pillar Inscription: Describes the war with the Hunas and the suppression of the Pushyamitras.
  • Kohom Inscription: Mentions the installation of idols of Jain Tirthankaras.
  • Last Great Ruler: Skandagupta was the last powerful emperor of the Gupta dynasty.
